captions.text: ( audience silences )

We're reckless, arrogant,
stupid dicks.

And the film actors guild
are pussies.
And kim jong il is an asshole.
Pussies don't like dicks,

Because pussies
get fucked by dicks.
But dicks also fuck assholes,

Assholes who just wanna
shit on everything.

Pussies may think they can
deal with assholes their way.

But the only thing
that can fuck an asshole

Is a dick...
With some balls.

The problem with dicks is that
sometimes they fuck too much.

<i>Or fuck when it isn't</i>
<i>appropriate.</i>
Yes, gary. Yes.

And it takes a pussy
to show 'em that.

But sometimes pussies
get so full of shit

That they become assholes
themselves.
Because pussies are only

An inch and a half away
from assholes.

I don't know much
in this crazy, crazy world...

But I do know that if you don't
let us fuck this asshole...

We are gonna have our dicks
and our pussies...
All covered in shit.
( crowd applauding )
( inaudible )
( crowd cheering )

comments.text:
+Dylan G Your evaluation of Iran is a pretty typical, modern, poor 
examination. The U.S. prevented a coup from the Tudeh (Soviet Backed 
Communists) by backing an extremely liberal National/Monarchy based front. 
The "democracy" wasn't legitimate anyway, as the tribal leadership and 
voting in most rural zones was cut out in favor of the more progressive 
urban centers. Which is why the Tudeh ended up co-opting the government, 
and which pushed the U.S. into action.

Iran was going to become someone's puppet--regardless. The U.S. used the 
king to make it America's puppet. It should be noted--the king was VERY 
liberal. And promoted education for women, more workers rights, religious 
freedom and tolerance. By the 1970's, Iran was very westernized and 
wealthy, actually. Unfortunately, the U.S. also tried to shut out the 
tribal leadership (Which we had used to gain us power in the first 
place)--and that tribal leadership is where you find the real hardcore 
Islamic elements, which eventually took over the country. But, in 1953? Our 
coup was definitely the "better" of the two--considering the Soviets were 
in the middle of their purges at the time, and killing millions. 

So, in short--usually when America supports an asshole (And we have--oh we 
have. South Africa, Timor, Argentina ect)...It's because America is trying 
to fuck an even bigger asshole. Since we are only one dick, we have to 
prioritize which asshole is going to produce the most shit. And at the 
time, that was the Soviet Empire, so we used other assholes to let us fuck 
the bigger asshole.
